description:
Goma-chan sees a news report about a zoo in Sapporo and wants to go see the full grown spotted seals.
Pa agrees to take a family trip to Hokkaido, but not just because Goma-chan wants to go.
Around the time Goma-chan came to Ashibe痴 place, there was a report on a missing baby seal at that zoo...
Source: crunchyroll
